title: War of the Roses: "I Love the Way You Make Me Feel When You Touch Me"
description: Twila snooped through her boyfriend Jeremy's phone and saw texts Jeremy was sending to someone that sounded like he might be sleeping with this person.  She hasn't confronted him about them yet because she thinks he'll just lie.  Will he send the roses to Twila, and if he does, what is his excuse for these text messages?
itunes:summary: Twila snooped through her boyfriend Jeremy's phone and saw texts Jeremy was sending to someone that sounded like he might be sleeping with this person.  She hasn't confronted him about them yet because she thinks he'll just lie.  Will he send the roses to Twila, and if he does, what is his excuse for these text messages?
